channel.title: Anti-virus on DefinIT
channel.description: Recent content in Anti-virus on DefinIT

item.title: Internet Explorer or Services.msc problems after McAfee Uninstall
item.description: I’m in the middle of rolling out Sophos as a replacement to the incumbent McAfee at work. One interesting thing that I found as I rolled out to some test users was that they were unable to log on to one of our internal systems using NTLM (integrated authentication). Instantly the roll out of Sophos was blamed - and I can understand why - the problem did not occur until Sophos was installed.
